sentence: In the race to replace retiring Representative Kevin Brady in Texas's eighth district, former Navy SEAL Morgan Luttrell, who was backed by House Republican leadership, had a wide lead over Christian Collins, the hard-right candidate backed by Representatives Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina.
title: Cisneros forces Cuellar into a runoff, a sign of liberal strength in a key Texas congressional race.
